title: Save2pc Ultimate 5.36 build 1494 + Patch-Cerberus
description:

Save2pc Ultimate 5.36 build 1494 + Patch-Cerberus | 5.84 MB

 
save2pc Ultimate - a program for downloading and converting video files stored on popular video hosting YouTube. With the help of YouTube Downloader can download any video file from a web service YouTube to set out on his page here. All that is required from the user - is to copy and paste the link into the window save2pc Ultimate, select the format you want and start the automatic download / convert video file. It supports most common video formats (AVI, WMV, MOV, 3GP, MP4). Probably not save the video, but only a sound track in MP3. To convert the downloaded files using software engine FFmpeg. If necessary, you can manually adjust all encoding options, using the usual commands codecs in a row starting.

With the Save2pc Ultimate users can upload videos to YouTube, Facebook, Myspace, DailyMotion, Vimeo, and other servers, including adult sites. The application has an automatic parsing of web addresses, and supports multi-threading, allowing the download of multiple files at once. It is possible to convert the stored video formats WMV, 3GP, MP4, MOV, AVI, MPEG, FLV and extract audio clips in MP3. Before uploading, you can preview the video clip, available to its size, duration, number of views and ratings. The program is able to bypass the blocking of YouTube videos by age - the user does not even have the need to start an account on this video service.

Features:

-Download videos from Youtube, GodTube, Google Video, MySpace Video, Megavideo, Break, DailyMotion, TeacherTube
-Download videos from adult video servers: RedTube, PornoTube, YouPorn, Megarotic, yuvutu.
-Automatic URL-parsing and multi-threaded downloading. Download several files at once.
-Convert downloaded videos on IPod, PSP, PDA, iPhone, Mobile Phone format.
-Save the downloaded video into various formats: ... AVI, MPEG, FLV or even WMV.
-Convert downloaded video and audio formats for mobile devices: MOV, MP4, 3GP, 3G2, MP3, WAV.
-Preview selected videos before downloading. Get the size, length, rating, views of a file before downloading it!
-Youtube content age verification bypass. You do not even need to create an account to download such videos.
-save2pc is a small, fast, useful, practical and powerful.


Platform : Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 8.1
Language : English
